subject: Simsonn Pro X Ultra Pedals shipped without base plate.
description_text:
I recently purchased a set of your Pro X Ultra pedals off amazon(Order #
113-7131278-8740217).
I paid $40 more for the version that included all accessories and the base
plate / heel plate.In the box that was shipped to me I see only the three
pedals (throttle, brake, clutch), the springs, the elastomers, and the
controller. No base plate or heel plate appears to be in the box. I do not
see how I am supposed to use these pedals without a heel plate, and if I
already owned on I wouldn't have paid extra for you to ship me one.

conversations.body_text: Hi Jay Judkins,  I am sorry for it, we will reship it ASAP.

Thanks for sending that out so fast.

Can you confirm the tracking number once it ships

On Mon, Dec 22, 2025, 4:32 AM support@simsonn.com

Is there any update on the status of the shipment with the pedal plate and
heel plate?

Please give me confirmation soon or I will have to request a return on
Amazon and have their customer service handle it. Having to return
perfectly good pedals over a missing part is ridiculous and I assure you
that I will be purchasing my next set from a competitor who will ship me
everything I paid for.

Hi Jay Judkins,     We have reshipped a new package to you from our US warehouse, here is the tracking number: 1ZJ201H40328316770 , the shipping carrier is UPS, you can track it via https://www.ups.com/track.
